    • Method Detail

      • verifyGraph

        public double verifyGraph​(int[][] R,
                          int[][] S,
                          double[][] hits,
                          Clustering[] clusteringR,
                          Clustering[] clusteringS,
                          double persThreshold,
                          int alg)
        Method to calculate Maximum Weighted Bipartite Matching (Jaccard).
        Parameters:
        R - : Tokens of left Partition.
        S - : Tokens of right Partition.
        hits - : Array of element scores. Depending on the algorithm, not all scores could have been calculated before.
        clusteringR - : Clustering of left Partition for element deduplication.
        clusteringS - : Clustering of right Partition for element deduplication.
        persThreshold - : θ for this specific pair: θ = δ / (1+δ) * (|R|+|S|)
        alg - : Algorithm to perform: 0 is classic Hungarian Algorithm, 1 is for Hungarian + Upper Bounds and 2 is for Hungarian + Upper & Lower Bounds.
        Returns:
        Record Similarity based on matching m, i.e. m / (|R|+|S|-m).

      • verifyGraph

        public double verifyGraph​(java.lang.String[] R,
                          java.lang.String[] S,
                          double[][] hits,
                          Clustering[] clusteringR,
                          Clustering[] clusteringS,
                          double persThreshold,
                          int alg)
        Method to calculate Maximum Weighted Bipartite Matching (Edit).
        Parameters:
        R - : Strings of left Partition.
        S - : Strings of right Partition.
        hits - : Array of element scores. Depending on the algorithm, not all scores could have been calculated before.
        clusteringR - : Clustering of left Partition for element deduplication.
        clusteringS - : Clustering of right Partition for element deduplication.
        persThreshold - : θ for this specific pair: θ = δ / (1+δ) * (|R|+|S|)
        alg - : Algorithm to perform: 0 is classic Hungarian Algorithm, 1 is for Hungarian + Upper Bounds and 2 is for Hungarian + Upper & Lower Bounds.
        Returns:
        Record Similarity based on matching m, i.e. m / (|R|+|S|-m).
